name: FunHaiku
0:
”Alexa, open Fun Haiku”
”Alexa, tell Fun Haiku to read me a haiku”
”Alexa, ask Fun Haiku to tell me a poem.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun haiku
des:
Prerequisites: Good knowledge of English; access to any Amazon voice assistants (Echo, etc), and must have an Amazon account.
To start this skills, simply say, "Alexa, open Fun Haiku". To get more haikus, you will say:"Alexa, tell Fun Haiku to read me a poem." OR "Alexa, ask Fun Haiku to read me a haiku." You must include Alexa, Fun Haiku, tell or ask, poem or haiku in your sentence.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
